overview: ShieldLock Ltd., located in Tel Aviv, Israel, has the goal of â€œTurning the cloud to a shield.â€ Established in 2010 by veterans in the information security field, ShieldLock operates in stealth mode and expects to announce public availability of their products in 2012, after two years of extensive development and research. The Product is a new innovative Mobile technology product helping developers to secure and protect their applications against Piracy by helping to manage licenses user efficiently. Cloud Guardian will help reducing piracy for all major Mobile platforms including Apple iOS, Google Android, Microsoft Windows Mobile and will be affordable for all developers no matter the size.
